title: ** LUXURY 1 BED ** ASTORIA ** S/S APPLIANCES ** CLOSE TO ALL **
posting_body: ['** LUXURY 1 BED ** ASTORIA', '** S/S APPLIANCES ** CLOSE TO ALL **', 'Listing ID #: 212968', 'Address: 31-64 21st Street, #12D', 'Price: $2,650', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'Bedrooms: 1.0', 'Bathrooms: 1.0', 'Pets: Case By Case', 'Apartment Amenities', 'Dishwasher', 'Granite Kitchen', 'High Ceilings', 'Light', 'Marble Bath', 'Open View', 'Renovated', 'Brand New Luxurious 1 Bedroom 1 Bathroom Apartment in the heart of Astoria.', 'Queen size bedroom, Kitchen is equipped with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and microwave.', 'This is a prime location with everything you need just steps away, Short walk to N and W trains and 15 minutes away from midtown Manhattan.', 'Plenty of Restaurants, Grocery Stores to choose from.', 'Multiple gyms, lounges and coffee shops just around the corner for your convenience.', 'Heat and Hot water included.', 'Call or text to view today.', '917-355-4162', 'Mashud Ahmed', 'Phone: (917) 355-4162', 'Fax: (212) 402-7856', 'Email: <URL>', 'The Bouklis Group \xa0 (917) 355-4162 \xa0 FAX (212) 402-7856 \xa0 <URL>', 'POSTED BY REALTYMX™', 'To view, call or text Mashud Ahmed at (917) 355-4162']
